the orthodox in
Enmesa

state.desc:

was the pseudo-Bishop of
Diocaesarea
in
Pontus

Isaiah
was a pseudo-bishop

Egypt
who wrote to

about
Isaiah
between
A.D. 518-538

was the Bishop of
Carthage

was a martyr

in

was a monk

this man
was a gardener

those who sought to inflict just vengeance upon
